animeDescription: A short film based on a story by Japanese writer Kenji Miyazawa.  Two young British hunters get lost in the woods and discover a strange restaurant. Are the hunters about to discover how it feels to be the hunted?  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Chuumon no Ooi Ryouriten', 'Chuumon no Ooi Ryouriten (1993)']
